reasoning: Hidradenitis suppurativa familial type 1 (AIFL1, caused by NCSTN mutations). Estimated incidence ~1-2 per 100k/year based on HS epidemiology. Familial forms represent ~10-15% of HS cases. AIFL1 is associated with NCSTN gene mutations and represents a distinct genetic subtype.
source: Hidradenitis Suppurativa epidemiological studies, genetic subtyping literature
